title: Edinburgh/South
name: The Royal Observatory
hours: Public Evenings every Friday 1900-2045 - must be booked in advance
content: Take a tour of the dome, housing one of Europe's largest telescopes. Learn about the history of the observatory and some of the cutting edge work they are carrying out today. If the weather is clear you can observe the stars in winter or the sun (through a special telescope) in summer. On some Fridays there is a special theme - check website for details.
